description: Demolition of existing extension and erection of a two storey rear extension at lower ground and ground floor and first floor closet wing extension and alterations to windows.
decision_conditions: <p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.44;background-color:#ffffff;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">Full details including samples of the external materials to be used on the external surfaces of the building, including glazing, pointing, and the metal roof, shall be submitted to and approved by the local planning authority, in writing, before the relevant work commences. The development shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with the details thus approved.&nbsp;</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.44;background-color:#ffffff;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><br></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-c235f545-7fff-a9fb-90a6-ab147a50f0cf"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.44;background-color:#ffffff;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">REASON: To ensure that the external appearance of the building is satisfactory and does not detract from the character and visual amenity of the conservation area.</span></p>

<p><span id="docs-internal-guid-7611f307-7fff-3d33-6839-7ee7c1b87a0b"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">Detailed drawings/full particulars of the proposed development showing the matters set out below must be submitted to and approved by the local planning authority, in writing, before the relevant work commences. The development shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with the details thus approved:-</span></span></p><p>i)  elevations at a scale of 1:20 of each window type showing the glazing pattern; and</p><p>ii) vertical and horizontal cross-sections at a scale of 1:5  showing the upper and lower stiles, the meeting rails, the dimensions of the glazing, and the profile and dimensions of the glazing bars and spacers (if any). </p><p>REASON: To preserve and enhance the character and appearance of the conservation area.&nbsp;</p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;background-color:#ffffff;margin-top:10pt;margin-bottom:0pt;padding:0pt 0pt 10pt 0pt;"><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">Prior to superstructure works, detailed specification and a drainage layout of at least one suitable sustainable drainage system</span><span style="background-color: transparent; font-family: Arial; white-space: pre-wrap;"> (i.e. water butt, rain garden, bio-retention planter box, living roof (substrate depth of 80-150 mm excluding the vegetative mat), permeable paving, etc.) shall be submitted to, and approved by the LPA, in consultation with the LLFA. If soakaways i.e. plastic modules and soakaway rings are used, an infiltration test must be carried out to ensure that the capacity of the soil is suitable for infiltration. It must be demonstrated that there will be no increase in surface water flow being discharged offsite and an overall reduction in peak flow rate and volume.&nbsp;</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-53f3a80a-7fff-2d2b-ce7c-c62bdd12f210"><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">REASON: </span><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: Arial; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">To protect and where possible enhance biodiversity leading to a net gain.</span></span><br></p>

The development hereby permitted must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this permission.


REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).
